One thing we have that they do not--Purple Princess! That other stuff not =
matter.
 
 Frank-s


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ursulabielski@sbcglob=
al.netDate: Wed, 28 Nov 2007 16:44:58 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ADDIN=
G TO THE IMPORTANT MESSAGE




Bruce,
I just wanted to drop a line and say =
Amen!   Granted, the electronic element is the 'e' in EVP (and the 'i' in I=
TC), but the most accomplished researchers (including Maggy and Jules, Kons=
tantin and Friedrich, and yes, Mark Macy, insist that if you have the harmo=
ny, love, and RESONANCE among researchers, all the electronic problems can =
be overcome.  
Is anyone involved in the AA-EVP 'Big Circle' group?  I see =
that they attempt contact all at once from their own homes around the count=
ry, I think on Thursday evenings at a set time.
Is anyone interested in thi=
s?  From what I see, and from my own new interest, it seems most of us try =
contacts as much as possible throughout the day.  Anyone want to try a set =
time?
UrsulaLance Oliver <orbhunterx@...> wrote:


Hello Bruce,Forgiv=
e me for bluntness, but typing in all capital letters is considered to be s=
houting by some of us. It's also hard to follow. Absolutely no offense inte=
nded... I just thought you should know.Thanks,Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com, 'bhali333' <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> HI GUY'S JUST A S=
HORT EXPLANATION OF WHAT I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO GATHER.> > > > ANYONE THAT IS =
A SERIOUS EVP RESEARCHER HAS PROBABLY READ THE ARTICLES > AND OR BOOKS PERT=
AINING TO THE EALY TIME STREAM EXPERIMENTS AND WHAT > WAS CALLED THE CIRCLE=
 OF LIGHT. IT INVOLVED SUCH RESEARCHERS AS MAGGY > HERSHBACH AND HER HUSBAN=
D THAT WHERE THE RECIPIENTS OF LONG LENGTHY > MESSAGES IN ALL DIFFERENT FOR=
MATS FROM THE SPIRIT WORLD THEY IN TURN > WORKED WITH SUCH EVP PIONEERS AS =
HANS MUELLER, KONSTANTINE > RAUDIVA,GEORGE MEEK AND MARK MACY TO NAME A FEW=
. THESE EARLY PIONEERS > THROUGH THE HERSHBACHS IN LUXEMBORG RECIEVED DETAI=
LED INSTRUCTIONS ON > HOW TO FURTHER COMMUNICATION THAT NOT ONLY LED TO OUR=
 CURRENT EVP > GATHERING TECHNIQUES BUT ALSO THE MOTHER OF ALL BOXES THE SP=
IRICOM.> THESE RESEARCHERS WERE TOLD THE MOST IMPORTANT INGREDIANT IN THE >=
 STRENGTH AND FURTHERENCE OF SPIRIT COMMUNICATION WAS HARMONY AND PEACE > A=
ND GOOD INTENTIONS WITHIN THIS CIRCLE THEY HAD BEEN LED TO FORM.> > BUT SAD=
LY AS HUMAN BEINGS USUALLY DO JELOUSY AND EGO BECAME A POISON TO > THE CIRC=
LE AND SOME INDIVIDUALS THAT WHERE ENVIOUS OF OTHERS SUPERIOR > SUCESSES BR=
OUGHT BAD VIBRATIONSS TO THE GROUP AND THE CIRCLE WAS BROKEN.> > IMMEDIATLY=
 FOLLOWING THE ADVANCED COMMUNICATION THAT HAD BEEN ENJOYED > FOR A NUMBER =
OF YEARS SLOWLY DWINDLED AWAY.> > NOW I BELIEVE WE ARE BEING GIVEN A SECOND=
 CHANCE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS > UNPRESIDENTED TASK AND BRIDGE THE GAP OF COMMU=
NICATION FULLY.> AS OF LATE THERE HAS BEEN A FLOOD OF NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT S=
EEMS TO BE > WORKING AS HOPED WE ARE IN OUR FETAL STAGES BUT I HAVE BEEN TO=
LD WE > WILL BE BROUGHT ALONG SLOWELY AND CAREFULLY.> > SO MY THOUGHTS ARE =
LETS KEEP THE GOOD VIBES AND HARMONY GOING AND BLOCK > AS MUCH OF THE NEGAT=
IVITY AS WE CAN AND ALL WORK TOGETHER TWORD THIS > COMMON GOAL. LETS NOT LE=
T THE SINS OF OUR FATHER SO TO SPEAK AFFECT > WHAT WE CAN ACCOMPLISH.> > BR=
UCE HALLIDAY>

=3DEC_ygrp-text>
<DIV>Hello Bruce,<BR><BR>Forgive me for bluntness, but typ=
ing in all capital letters is <BR>considered to be shouting by some of us. =
It's also hard to follow. <BR><BR>Absolutely no offense intended... I just =
thought you should know.<BR><BR>Thanks,<BR>Lance<BR><BR>--- In <A href=3D"m=
ailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com">EVP-ITC@yahoogroups<WBR>.com</A>, 'bhali333'=
 <BR><paranormalinvestig<WBR>ating@...<WBR>> wrote:<BR>><BR>> H=
I GUY'S JUST A SHORT EXPLANATION OF WHAT I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO <BR>GATHER.<BR=
>> <BR>> <BR>> <BR>> ANYONE THAT IS A SERIOUS EVP RESEARCHER HA=
S PROBABLY READ THE <BR>ARTICLES <BR>> AND OR BOOKS PERTAINING TO THE EA=
LY TIME STREAM EXPERIMENTS AND <BR>WHAT <BR>> WAS CALLED THE CIRCLE OF L=
IGHT. IT INVOLVED SUCH RESEARCHERS AS <BR>MAGGY <BR>> HERSHBACH AND HER =
HUSBAND THAT WHERE THE RECIPIENTS OF LONG LENGTHY <BR>> MESSAGES IN ALL =
DIFFERENT FORMATS FROM THE SPIRIT WORLD THEY IN <BR>TURN <BR>> WORKED WI=
TH SUCH EVP PIONEERS AS HANS MUELLER, KONSTANTINE <BR>> RAUDIVA,GEORGE M=
EEK AND MARK MACY TO NAME A FEW. THESE EARLY <BR>PIONEERS <BR>> THROUGH =
THE HERSHBACHS IN LUXEMBORG RECIEVED DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS <BR>ON <BR>> =
HOW TO FURTHER COMMUNICATION THAT NOT ONLY LED TO OUR CURRENT EVP <BR>> =
GATHERING TECHNIQUES BUT ALSO THE MOTHER OF ALL BOXES THE SPIRICOM.<BR>>=
 THESE RESEARCHERS WERE TOLD THE MOST IMPORTANT INGREDIANT IN THE <BR>> =
STRENGTH AND FURTHERENCE OF SPIRIT COMMUNICATION WAS HARMONY AND <BR>PEACE =
<BR>> AND GOOD INTENTIONS WITHIN THIS CIRCLE THEY HAD BEEN LED TO FORM.<=
BR>> <BR>> BUT SADLY AS HUMAN BEINGS USUALLY DO JELOUSY AND EGO BECAM=
E A <BR>POISON TO <BR>> THE CIRCLE AND SOME INDIVIDUALS THAT WHERE ENVIO=
US OF OTHERS <BR>SUPERIOR <BR>> SUCESSES BROUGHT BAD VIBRATIONSS TO THE =
GROUP AND THE CIRCLE WAS <BR>BROKEN.<BR>> <BR>> IMMEDIATLY FOLLOWING =
THE ADVANCED COMMUNICATION THAT HAD BEEN <BR>ENJOYED <BR>> FOR A NUMBER =
OF YEARS SLOWLY DWINDLED AWAY.<BR>> <BR>> NOW I BELIEVE WE ARE BEING =
GIVEN A SECOND CHANCE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS <BR>> UNPRESIDENTED TASK AND BR=
IDGE THE GAP OF COMMUNICATION FULLY.<BR>> AS OF LATE THERE HAS BEEN A FL=
OOD OF NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT SEEMS TO <BR>BE <BR>> WORKING AS HOPED WE ARE=
 IN OUR FETAL STAGES BUT I HAVE BEEN TOLD WE <BR>> WILL BE BROUGHT ALONG=
 SLOWELY AND CAREFULLY.<BR>> <BR>> SO MY THOUGHTS ARE LETS KEEP THE G=
OOD VIBES AND HARMONY GOING AND <BR>BLOCK <BR>> AS MUCH OF THE NEGATIVIT=
Y AS WE CAN AND ALL WORK TOGETHER TWORD <BR>THIS <BR>> COMMON GOAL. LETS=
 NOT LET THE SINS OF OUR FATHER SO TO SPEAK AFFECT <BR>> WHAT WE CAN ACC=
OMPLISH.<BR>> <BR>> BRUCE HALLIDAY<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></BLOCK=
QUOTE><BR>
